developer.title: XOUT#0509 | Dev of 4 Orgs | Developer of 1200+ BOTS
developer.description:
💿 Hello I am **Tomato** <@442355791412854784> *(`XOUT#0509`)*, and i made more then 1200 different Discord Bots: [My Bot List](https://botlist.milrato.dev)

💿 I am very proud for all of my verified and not verified Discord Bots, but the Bot I am the most proud of is: [**LAVA MUSIC** | `2021's Best Music Bot`](https://lava.milrato.dev) <@742672021422342165>

💿 I made this Bot, and you can get a free Bot too! Just go to: [My Service](https://dc.milrato)

💿 I am also a **Website** Developer and **Plugin** dev. I made **Modules** like a **SPEECH Module** [SEE IT](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/778714123785076768/801606374105546782/2021-01-21_01-15-50.mp4)

💿 Yeah i hope you like my stuff :v: <3

overview.title: :gear: **__Command Category Overview__**
overview.desc:
> 👍 ... **Overview**

> 🔰 ... **Information**
> 🎶 ... **Music Related**
> ⚙ ... **Settings & 👑 Owner & ⌨️Programming**
> 🎤 ... **Voice & 📈 Ranking**
> 🎮 ... **Mini Games & 🕹️ Fun**
> 🚫 ... **Administration & 💪 Setup**
> 🔞 ... **NSFW**
> 🦾 ... **Custom Commands**

> *Click on the Button Emojis to jump to the Command Category*
> *Use the Arrows to swap the Pages forward/backward/jump-back-home*

setup-embed.variable2:
`1️⃣ **==** Change the **Color** of the Embeds

2️⃣ **==** Change the **Image** of the Embeds

3️⃣ **==** Change the **Footer Text** of the Embeds

4️⃣ **==** ${es.thumb ? `**Disable** the Thumbnail for Embeds` : `**Enable** the Thumbnail for Embeds`}



*React With The Right Emoji For Right Actions😊*`
setup-embed.variable3: `<:no:833101993668771842> I don't have permission to add reactions`
setup-embed.variable6: `Send it now!\n\nMake sure to use a valid **HEX CODE** For Example: **\`#ffee22\`** __with__ the \`#\``
setup-embed.variable8: `Note that a HEX COLOR looks like that: \`#ffee22\``
setup-embed.variable10: `Note that a HEX COLOR looks like that: \`#ffee22\``
setup-embed.variable12: `<:no:833101993668771842> An error has occurred, please contact: `XOUT#0509``

setup-embed.variable16: `Note that you may not delete this image from where ever the source is from! A Link is appreciated`
setup-embed.variable18: `<:no:833101993668771842> An error has occurred, please contact: `XOUT#0509``
setup-embed.variable23: `<:no:833101993668771842> An error has occurred, please contact: `XOUT#0509``
setup-embed.variable26: `What should be your new Footer Text?`
setup-embed.variable27: `Note that it's the Text that's very small and at the bottom of an Embed\n\nEnter the Text now!`
setup-embed.variable28: `<:no:833101993668771842> An error has occurred, please contact: `XOUT#0509``
setup-embed.variable32: `${es.thumb ? `Strings will add Thumbnails to each Embed Message`: `Strings will Now **not** add a Thumbnail to Embed Messages`}`
